Header.nativeAppBeforeLogin.Content: Pearl River Resort requires you to install the app before placing any bets.
Header.appInstall.text: Download the Pearl River Resort App Here.
Footer.info:
Pearl River Resort Gaming™ Actively Supports And Encourages Responsible Gaming.
If You Think You May Need Support In Getting Control Of Your Gambling, We Urge You To Call The National Council Of
Problem Gambling At 1.800.522.4700.
Footer.working_hours_title: Pearl River Resort Sports Betting Hours
Footer.working_hours_line2: Opens daily at 6:30am and closes at 5:30am
Footer.working_hours_line4: Opens daily at 8:45am and closes at 5:45am
Footer.responsible: Must be 21+ and located in West Virginia to bet. All sports wagers regulated by the West Virginia Lottery. Please play responsibly. If you or someone you know has a problem with gambling, call 1-800-GAMBLER (1-800-426-8537). Assistance is also available by calling or texting 1-800-522-4700, chatting online via http://www.ncpgambling.org/help-treatment/chat or visiting the National Council on Problem Gambling Services website at http://www.ncpgambling.org/. Information, resources, counseling and referral services can be accessed 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Visit our responsible Gaming page to learn more

nativeApp.failedGeolocation.title: Geolocation Failure
nativeApp.failedGeolocation.contect.CO: We have detected you are trying to place a wager while located outside the state of Colorado where wagering is permitted.
nativeApp.failedGeolocation.contect2.CO: If you think you are seeing this message in error, please log out of and close the Pearl River Resort app. Try Again. If you have any questions, please contact us at sb@QCasinoDBQ.com.
appInstaller.nativeAppios.shouldDwn: You may still use the Website to browse and track active or settled bets; however, if you want to place wagers or Cash Out then download the app and be located in NJ to play.
appInstaller.headerContent1.step1.MS: Due to Restrictions, you must install the app for us to verify your location, 21+ and present in MS.
Geolocation.ErrorCode.612.MS: Player Location Check is not installed on the user's computer. Download plugin from link below.

Transaction.Sightline.Enroll.Note1: Verifying your Pearl River Resort Play+ instruction for transactions, please wait...
Transaction.Sightline.Enroll.Note5:
• Enroll in Pearl River Resort Play+ today
  • Fund with your Credit or Debit Card, Pay With My Bank, or PayPal
  • Fast Deposits and Cash-Outs
  • Receive your physical Pearl River Resort Play+ prepaid card in as little as 10-14 days
  • Use everywhere Discover® is accepted
  • In order to wager, you must transfer funds from your Play+ account to your Pearl River Resort account
Transaction.Sightline.Funding.Title: Fund your Pearl River Resort Play+ account
Transaction.Sightline.SB.Info: In order to wager, you must transfer funds from your Play+ account to your Pearl River Resort account.
Transaction.Sightline.Funding.Note1:
• Step 1: Click Fund Play+ to add funds to your Play+ account with a Credit or Debit Card, Pay With My Bank, or PayPal.
  • Step 2: Transfer from Play+ to Pearl River Resort by clicking Deposit in the Cashier.

During the login process, we will need to verify that you are within a permitted area. If you are not in a permitted area, you will not be able to place any wagers. In order to verify your location, it is needed to use MacOS, Windows, iOS or Android. Your OS is not currently supported.
